page.title: 18NESTON PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Sometimes A might choose one of them which may be his, if so everybody shouts 'you' and A has to catch the ball.When somebody has 3 bad eggs they have to do a forfit.Now, let's look at something else. What should we look at? Red Letter, that's pretty good. In Red Letter somebody is on.They choose a letter which is the red letter.Let's say I was on and my red letter was 'T'.I would say a letter to the others maybe 'E'.Then the people who have an 'E' in their name take as many strides forward as they have 'E's in their name.If I said 'T' nobody can move. Oh! the whistle has just been blown that must mean the end of playtime.Must fly. Byeeeeee!!
